body:
This is something that is used by QA to easily check whether an experiment is active during testing.

It is also used by QA and SUMO to help narrow down bugs from users in the field, to determine which setting(s) were active at the time the bug happened.

We want a historical record of prior pref-flip settings (start day, end day, pref name, cohort).
